notes:
It is the [[Dragons]]' boss. Looks the same as a [[Dragon Lord]]. Always spawns with two [[Dragon Lord]]s, save for in the quest room. Demodras' corpse can be skinned for a chance of getting a [[Red Dragon Leather]].

The [[Killing in the Name of... Quest|special task]] teleport is located inside the [[PoH Dragon Lair]], {{Mapper Coords|128.1|126.34|10|4|text=here}}.
strategy:
'''[[Mage]]s:''' Get a good [[blocker]], and use [[Sudden Death Rune]]s or [[Icicle Rune]]s if your level and magic level are high enough. Otherwise, bring a [[Paladin]] or other [[Mage]]s for back-up. A Mage or Paladin may attempt the special task at level 100 with reasonable success. Paladins will probably not need [[Magic Shield]].
'''[[Knights]]:''' It is possible to solo this creature with good skills and high level using [[Fierce Berserk]]. It is advised to attempt the special task on at least level 130 when you can use [[Ultimate Healing Potion]]s.
